rComments: Homework is 50/50 split, alternating weekly between written assignments & programming. Pair work is expected, but the work isn't impossibly hard in that you could probably/carry yr partner if totally necessary. Clear and organized lecturing that stays on schedule, but might lose the class while explaining the statistics side of algorithms. GR8 PROF

Every homework was done in pairs, which was a good thing if you managed to find a good partner and a bad thing if you didn't. The class seemed to be generously graded, but the final grade was much lower than expected. The written homeworks were alright, and the last programming homework was difficult. Final exam was much harder than the midterm.

Great class! Professor Vishwanathan (vishy) was very clear and explained the subject as many times as necessary so everybody could understand and be on the same page. The final  as well as some of the homeworks were tough, be prepared to work. But it is all worth it, at the end of the class you will have gained a lot of important knowledge.
